interestingFacts: India is home to the Taj Mahal, one of the Seven Wonders of the World.
The U.S. has the world’s largest economy.
Japan is known for its cherry blossoms and advanced technology.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest rainforest on Earth.
Germany is famous for Oktoberfest and automotive engineering.
Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the world’s largest coral reef system.
South Africa is nicknamed the 'Rainbow Nation' for its cultural diversity.
